Adeline Fermanian

I am a PhD student in Statistics at LPSM, Sorbonne Université, under the supervision of Gérard Biau and Benoît Cadre.

Curriculum Vitae

Research

I am interested in applications of rough paths theory to statistical learning. You can find my master thesis on the subject below.

Master thesis (2018)
